channel.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
channel.description:
Here at mopar people come for help with private servers. Most people get flamed. Let's make a list of people who have had unanswered-simple questions, and people who have been flamed; I'll start it off!
1.) Waffles!! - Flamed, questions unanswered 2.)Itzkyle--Questions unanswerd, flamed, and work not appriceated Cept by one person "zammyking111" <-- Thank You
All you have to do is add your name under mine, and what's happened to you! Let's see if we can make a difference in this community.

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

But some thing’s people need help with are so unnessisary when theres stickied threads about them

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'

item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

What were the problems you had, that you were complaining about being flamed about?

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Which problem, my problems are unique problems, and probably won’t be locatable in a thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:32, topic:146656”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=200708.msg1784547#msg1784547 date=1190939755]
That is the problem. It pisses me off, that I have made FAQ’s to end the stupid questions. If the noob’s would actually look at those, it would be easier. They would learn the answer’s to the problems, easier, and faster. They need to be told how much they can benefit from things people have made to help them understand, and learn. The occasional problem with things while doing this is alright, as it is something that does require additional help, and explanation. Thread’s like those I do not mind at all.
[/quote]
Most people wouldn’t bother to read that post. What makes you think they’d follow a tut that’s not C+P?[/quote]

It’s not a tut. Which brings me to ask, have you searched for your problem there?

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:20, topic:146656”][quote author=Moparrsplaya link=topic=200708.msg1783430#msg1783430 date=1190876910]

just ignore it or bitch back…

Then get in more trouble…I’d like to remain unbanned, tyvm.

Also, Taharok, the rules say no flaming. Could you imagine the number of bans you’d have if the mods and admins actually banned 90% of the flaming here?
It’d be a very high number, and a large proportion of people who actually come here.
[/quote]

Hmm, there would be no community. People are not perfect. All we can do is set rules and warn you to follow them or get a nice shiny visual warning badge. Other than that, it is the community’s overall choice whether they want to bitch around in a shithole all day or actually get work done in a developmental environment.

Why don’t you just ban…have a CLEAN community.[/quote]

I guarantee there would be no community at all. The community depends on its members.
[/quote]

Load of bull shit. Someone got muted for saying 3-non-flamming words.

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:27, topic:146656”]No really need for this, here’s some info:

A member like me would help sometimes but mostly it’s one same question:
-No-ip / Connection problems / Can’t start server / java error
they have been answered a lot and they just keep asking them while there’s a tutorial about it. that’s why I actually don’t answer any of those anymore and because of this I also don’t really answer any other question, maybe because i wrote it ten times or more.
bassicly I only post something when I’m in the mood.[/quote]

Same, it gets tiring helping people over and over again with the same questions.
And most of the time, they don’t understand what your telling them to do anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:18, topic:146656”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=200708.msg1783411#msg1783411 date=1190876616]
Providing us with some evidence may help the matter. Sure you may say it happened, but that me not be exactly what happened. Maybe you were being an ass and deserved to get flamed. Maybe you were constantly breaking the rules when posting. This is why evidence is so important. There is always a reason as to why people do things. We need to see the full situation before we can asses the issue. I am sure everyone will agree with me on that.
[/quote]

It is usually the asshole who flames you; not you being an asshole to deserve flaming (because 1) that is a moparisthebest.com scenario and 2) that means two assholes are involved.)[/quote]

Nonetheless, some Moparisthebestians decide to come here and bring thier scenario’s here. However you have a point. However, for this particular situation, we do not know the story as to what happened to these two. This still brings me back to me other point as maybe they deserved to be flamed, because they might have been assholes themselves.

I understand your point by making this thread. Sometimes flaming happens when there may just be one person following the rules, and one asshole comes along decides to flame them because they feel like it, or maybe they spelt something wrong (I have seen this before). However, this does not, under any circumstances give you the right to flame them back, or flame us, who have done nothing. Getting pissed off due to the situation you are in, is not a way to solve your problem. Right now, I think the best possible situation is to give the person who flamed you a kind and polite PM, and consult them as to why they flamed you. This can also be done over msn. If this goes to far, you can stop PMing and end the situation. If you do not choose to do this, the only other option is to forget about it, and hope it doesn’t happen again.

Read full topic

just ignore it or bitch back…

Also, Taharok, the rules say no flaming. Could you imagine the number of bans you’d have if the mods and admins actually banned 90% of the flaming here?
It’d be a very high number, and a large proportion of people who actually come here.[/quote]

Hmm, there would be no community. People are not perfect. All we can do is set rules and warn you to follow them or get a nice shiny visual warning badge. Other than that, it is the community’s overall choice whether they want to bitch around in a shithole all day or actually get work done in a developmental environment.

Why don’t you just ban…have a CLEAN community.

[/quote]

I guarantee there would be no community at all. The community depends on its members.

item.title: Petitioning Mopar's so called 'help'
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:11, topic:146656”][quote author=sicarius99 link=topic=200708.msg1783378#msg1783378 date=1190876176]
just ignore it or bitch back…
[/quote]
Then get in more trouble…I’d like to remain unbanned, tyvm.

Also, Taharok, the rules say no flaming. Could you imagine the number of bans you’d have if the mods and admins actually banned 90% of the flaming here?
It’d be a very high number, and a large proportion of people who actually come here.[/quote]

Hmm, there would be no community. People are not perfect. All we can do is set rules and warn you to follow them or get a nice shiny visual warning badge. Other than that, it is the community’s overall choice whether they want to bitch around in a shithole all day or actually get work done in a developmental environment.

On another topic

Most people who go to moparscape are just 10-12 year olds trying to act cool for whatever reason. Like 5 other posts have said, its best to just report them and then ignore.

Correction, 8-15. The majority is 11-14.

pregg:

Maby if they wern’t so damn stupid, we might not flame them.

Oh, so you are so very perfect that you have the right to judge others and show them their faults?

Tico135:

Providing us with some evidence may help the matter. Sure you may say it happened, but that me not be exactly what happened. Maybe you were being an ass and deserved to get flamed. Maybe you were constantly breaking the rules when posting. This is why evidence is so important. There is always a reason as to why people do things. We need to see the full situation before we can asses the issue. I am sure everyone will agree with me on that.

It is usually the asshole who flames you; not you being an asshole to deserve flaming (because 1) that is a moparisthebest.com scenario and 2) that means two assholes are involved.)

Read full topic
